title: Commenting on News
content: Blackwater's plan to [hide behind](http://worldgame.blogspot.com/2004/11/pentagon-public-or-private.html) the State Department, further soiling this nation's reputation, is not helpful to the USA's standing among nations.  Is Condi really their protective mommy then? The FBI is being quite [namby-pamby](http://mybizmo.blogspot.com/2009/07/hp-half-blood-prince-movie-review.html).As far as the Iranian energy program goes, as a long time Fuller Schooler I'm always studying the [grid maps](http://www.geni.org/).  How will the new juice help alleviate power shortages in faraway Turkey?  Lots to consider.
author: Kirby Urner
